sen.j: 定子が儲けた敦康親王が、后腹の第一皇子でありながら即位できなかったのも、それゆえである。
sen.e: This was the reason why Prince Atsuyasu could not accede to the throne despite the fact that he was the first crown prince born from the empress's womb.
For this the reason, Prince Atsuyasu, despite being the son of an empress, was unable to ascend the throne.
For this the reason, Imperial Prince Atsuyasu, despite being the first son of an empress, was unable to ascend the throne.
sen.cmt: 原文の内容に合わせて訳文を修正。親王→Imperial Prince
